Reviews.Title: Great Lunch Cube!
Reviews.Author: Judith young-espeut
Reviews.Content: I'm abandoning plastic and disposables in an effort to do my part in the green initiative. This lunch cube has helped with that effort. The lid fits tightly and it's deep enough to hold a substantial sandwich or snack.Exactly as advertised!

Reviews.Title: tough and clean
Reviews.Author: Donald Armstrong "Cavalier 46"
Reviews.Content: No more plastic ruining the taste of my sandwiches and killing me slowing with poison...these stainless steal sandwich boxes will hold regular bread with actual grain in it, as opposed to the plastic versions designed to hold fake wonder bread.they also withstand the slam of the ski lift into your pack so your sandwich is full and fresh and distinguishable at lunch time.

Reviews.Title: Glad I Bought It For My Son
Reviews.Author: mommyA
Reviews.Content: I have a little man who is in Kindergarten and I bought this lunch for him, which is just the right size. It is easy to clean up, easy for him to open, and durable. Worth the buy!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: shalew
Reviews.Content: wish i had gotten these instead of the reusable lunch baggies with zippers ( which a few didn't hold up to the every day use and had to be hand washed to really get the chip crumbs out of )

Reviews.Title: Good product but lid may be hard for kids to open by themselves
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Bunny B "Kukuy"
Reviews.Content: Good product- glad it's stainless steel but cover could be hard to open for toddlers. It's not the easiest even for me to open but I guess that's good so food won't spill.  Great for  sandwiches and live that it is NOT plastic!  :)

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Cady
Reviews.Content: My friend let me bought it, looks great, good quality. But I don't know where can I use this, because this box is too small.

Reviews.Title: Well Built
Reviews.Author: Durwood
Reviews.Content: This is a great sandwich box and is built to last. In a day of plastic and more plastic it is refreshing to see that there are still good quality products built to last and not just thrown away.
